title: One Piece: The Water 7 Saga is a Masterclass in Villains
author: GameRant Editorial
description: An in-depth article analyzing the Water 7 Saga and how CP9 represents some of the best-crafted villains in One Piece. Discusses the impact of episodes like 246 where Lucci's power is fully revealed.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs

title: The Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard, Explained
author: GameRant
description: A comprehensive breakdown of Rob Lucci's Devil Fruit ability, including its debut in Episode 246, its strengths and weaknesses, and how Lucci uses it in combination with Rokushiki techniques.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Lucci's awakened form from later arcs

title: One Piece: Water 7 Arc | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers
description: A complete summary and review of the Water 7 Arc, including detailed coverage of Episode 246 and the CP9 confrontation at Galley-La headquarters.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 Arc

title: 10 Best Things The Water 7 Arc Added To One Piece's Story
author: CBR Editorial
description: An editorial examining the most important story elements introduced in the Water 7 Arc, including the CP9 reveal and Lucci's Devil Fruit demonstration in Episode 246.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses major plot points from the Water 7 Arc

title: One Piece Chronicles | Water 7 to CP9 Reveal (Part 1)
author: The Yonk≈ç Table
description: A podcast episode discussing the Water 7 arc from the arrival at the island through the CP9 reveal and Lucci's transformation. Includes analysis of Episodes 243-246.

title: One Piece: Rokushiki, Explained
author: GameRant
description: A detailed explanation of the Rokushiki martial arts techniques used by CP9, including Rankyaku which Lucci demonstrates in Episode 246 by cutting the Galley-La headquarters in half.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about all Rokushiki techniques shown throughout Water 7 and Enies Lobby

title: Reading One Piece for the first time - Water 7 Saga Review
author: Book Cheshire Cat
description: A first-time reader's perspective on the Water 7 Saga, including reactions to major moments like Lucci's transformation and the crew's defeat in Episode 246.

title: One Piece: How Powerful is Rob Lucci's Awakened Form? - Cat Cat Fruit: Model Leopard Devil Fruit Explained
author: FandomWire
description: An analysis of Rob Lucci's Devil Fruit from its debut in Episode 246 through its awakened form in later arcs, examining the evolution of his powers.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers about Lucci's awakened Devil Fruit form from the Egghead arc
